mapper.sql: id, schedule_name, grade, year, term, status, create_date, tn_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_schedule_task ( schedule_name, grade, year, term, status, create_date, tn_id ) VALUES ( #{scheduleName}, #{grade}, #{year}, #{term}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{tnId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_schedule_task
schedule_name = #{scheduleName},
grade = #{grade},
year = #{year},
term = #{term},
status = #{status},
create_date = #{createDate},
tn_id = #{tnId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_schedule_task
schedule_name = #{map.scheduleName},
grade = #{map.grade},
year = #{map.year},
term = #{map.term},
status = #{map.status},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_schedule_task ( schedule_name, grade, year, term, status, create_date, tn_id ) VALUES ( #{map.scheduleName}, #{map.grade}, #{map.year}, #{map.term}, #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.tnId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_schedule_task
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND schedule_name like CONCAT('%', #{scheduleName} , '%')
AND grade like CONCAT('%', #{grade} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{year} , '%')
AND term like CONCAT('%', #{term} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{tnId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
